quizzes.title: x quiz

questions.text: Is product x hosted by a third party outside ING?
questions.explanation: Product x is being administrated at a third party located in y

questions.text: Which picture of available options for product x has the beste features?

images.alt: description of a when not loaded
description of b when not loaded
description of c when not loaded

questions.explanation: Variant c has in total z features, more then any of the other variants

questions.explanation: Variant a matches the image best

questions.text: Which product variant of product x has the beste features?
questions.explanation: Variant c has in total z features more then the other variants

questions.text: Order the product variant from most to least features
questions.explanation: Variant a has in total z features more then b which in turn has more features than c
Variant c has in total z features more then the other variants

questions.text: Decribe the slogan to attract customers for product x, you need to mention at least 2 key elements
questions.explanation: Product x, easy and rubust when used and amongst the cheapest on the market

questions.explanation: Product x, easy and rubust when used and amongst the cheapest on the market

questions.explanation: You should be at least 18 to apply but for a partner 16 is the minimum
